detaileddescription.para: In a nutshell, this node implements a very simple service able to communicate with moveit in order to perform a manipulation with the RoboCLuedo hunter manipulator. The robot comes with a set of predefined poses, that the controller can call under request.

xrefdescription.para: implement a form of asynchronous movement
introduce cartesian planning and a clear end effector
the way the node uses moveit is a bit raw ... it would deserve a review.
